info.name: Tumblr - Chris Colfer signature cursor
info.description: Chris Colfer's signature as a cursor for your Tumblr dashboard! (With bonus information on how to add this to your blog, instead!)
info.additionalInfo: Tested on Firefox only. Please let me know on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any possible alignment issues, questions, or requests! Or, if you'd rather add this to your blog instead of your dash, just place the code found here [x] inside the body (search /head in your CSS and scroll down to the body section) portion of your blog's CSS.
